title: Kitchen

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Kitchen in a player-owned house is a room that a player can build at level 5 Construction for 5,000. Kitchens have two, non-parallel door spaces making it a good corner room.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Kitchen
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
Kitchen
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level5
Cost5,000
Door layout
Kitchen

The Kitchen in a player-owned house is a room that a player can build at level 5 Construction for 5,000. Kitchens have two, non-parallel door spaces making it a good corner room.

In the kitchen, players have their own water supply, a fire to cook their food, and a larder where players can get their cooking materials.

There are 8 hotspots available:

  • Barrel space
  • Cat basket space
  • Larder space
  • Shelf space
  • Sink space
  • Spice rack space
  • Stove space
  • Table space

Contents

  • 1 Barrel
  • 2 Cat basket
  • 3 Larder
  • 4 Shelf
  • 5 Sink
  • 6 Spice Rack
  • 7 Stove
  • 8 Table

Shelf[edit | edit source]

Shelves of all levels provide cups of tea that provide Construction boosts depending on the type. By combining with the tea leaves obtained from any larder, high-level useful furniture such as mahogany lecterns and gilded altars can be built at a lower level. While it appears that there are 3 shelf hotspots, only one can be built. When one is built, 3 shelves appear: one with utensils, and two with dishware.

Players are advised against building oak shelves 1 as the lower-tier wooden shelves 3 provides a greater boost when making cups of tea.
